text: Clapham Common Club, usually known by its initials C.C.C., was a mid- nineteenth century amateur English football club based at Clapham Common. Active during the period between 1865 and 1871, it played both association football and codes closer to rugby football. ==See also== * Clapham Rovers F.C. ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in England Category:Defunct football clubs in London Category:1865 establishments in England Category:Association football clubs established in 1865 Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 1871
title: Clapham Common Club
